text:
and pregnant and lactating women (PLW) are also 
screened using mid-upper arm circumference (MUAC). Those identified as moderately 
malnourished are referred to TSF for 3-month supplementary food rations, where available 
(14). The EOS/TSF programme began in 2004 as a pilot, and quickly scaled up to cover 
6.8 million children in 365 drought-prone woredas. In 2005/6, the programme was 
expanded through the EEOS, which covers additional woredas with a reduced package 
of only vitamin A supplement
